segments.text: As I observe the scene, I feel a sense of disbelief at how the woman is entirely in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the edge of the sink like a waterfall, yet she remains fixated on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone has told her that multitasking doesn't include ignoring the obvious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s frustrating to watch, knowing that she’s so close to discovering the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy’s steady climb up the stool is both impressive and distressing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s like a little daredevil, bravely reaching for those cookies without a thought of the consequences.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can feel my heart racing as he stretches further; it’s a moment that teeters on the edge of disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
